name: frothily
content:
frothily adverb
(NOT SERIOUSLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is enjoyable but not very serious: This is a frothily enjoyable story about the life and loves of a famous novelist. She plays the part of a divorcee in this frothily amusing production.
More examplesFewer examplesTheir scripts are frothily funny yet informed by female empowerment.It's a frothily written detective series in which a vampire works as a private investigator.

frothily adverb
(WITH BUBBLES)
